MS MCQs

    Run SQL Server 2019 on Linux containers - Choose to run SQL Server on Linux containers

    »

    1. You want to run a Windows server and a Linux server as cheaply as possible. Which of the following configurations should you use?

      Use a Windows Server container and a Linux container running on a single container host.

      Use a Windows Server VM and a Linux VM running on a single Hyper-V host.

      Use a Windows Server container and a Linux container running on two separate container hosts.


    2. You want to host a database for a website. The database will run on SQL Server 2019 and Ubuntu Linux. When you expect demand to increase, it is vital that you can increase capacity as fast as possible. Which architecture should you use?

      Deploy Linux on containers hosted by a Windows container host.

      Deploy Linux on VMs hosted by a Windows Hyper-V server.

      Deploy Linux on containers hosted by a Linux server.
